import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaUserPlus, FaMoneyBillWave, FaPlay, FaCalendarAlt, FaClipboardCheck, FaChartBar, FaAdjust, FaFileInvoice } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './Sidebar.css'; const Sidebar = ({role}) => { return (
{role !== 'Employee' && ( <> Add User Payroll Leaves Salary Adjustment Compliance Reports )} Payroll Run Payslips
); }; export default Sidebar;
